product_name: Eagle Creek SignalSearch TSA Lock - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Feel reassured as you travel-lock your checked luggage with the Eagle Creek SignalSearch TSA Lock. A red and green light function lets you know if TSA screeners have opened your bag. Travel Sentry(R)-approved luggage lock secures belongings and allows U.S. airport security screeners to open the lock without destroying it and relock it after inspection. SignalSearch button lets you know if your lock has been opened. 3-dial combination. Closeout.
short_description: Feel reassured as you travel-lock your checked luggage with the Eagle Creek SignalSearch TSA Lock. A red and green light function lets you know if TSA screeners have opened your bag.
